7) AND ow.refchar4 = 'STORE' AND ow.orderkey = owd.orderkey AND owd.status in ('SHIPPED','CANCELED') union All SELECT CASE WHEN ow.site_id = 'MTD' THEN '0899' WHEN ow.site_id = 'END' THEN '0271' WHEN ow.site_id = 'OCD' THEN '0273' END SBISS, ' ' as FEL01, nvl(substr(owd.externorderkey,1,(instr(owd.externorderkey,'-',1,1) -
